channel.title: Make, a podcast about death
channel.itunes:author: Storytelling Fellows
channel.description: Welcome to Make. That's pronounced "mah-keh" - the Hawaiian word for "death." This podcast series explores death and times of dying. What do you remember about how your lived ones died?
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to Make. That's pronounced "mah-keh" - the Hawaiian word for "death." This podcast series explores death and times of dying. What do you remember about how your lived ones died?
channel.itunes:subtitle: Remembering the death of your loved ones.

item.title: Episode 1: The Lead Up
item.description: This episode covers the beginning of the end. My dad, Anthony Yee, passed away on July 11th, 2018. This is the lead up to that day.
item.itunes:summary: This episode covers the beginning of the end. My dad, Anthony Yee, passed away on July 11th, 2018. This is the lead up to that day.
item.itunes:subtitle: How did Anthony Yee die? The lead up to my dad's death.
